error.comment: This error shows up in Firefox build logs during the tooltool artifact download step.

diagnosis.summary: In Mozilla Firefox Windows builds, this error occurs when the local system python (or the virtual environment where python is running) does not have pypiwin32 installed.

error.message: The program can't start because MSVCR100.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix this problem.
error.comment: This error shows up in a Windows graphical error message dialogue that pops up in the user environment

diagnosis.summary: In Mozilla Firefox Windows builds, this error occurs when an attempt is made to run a yasm assembler, which has a dependency on C:\Windows\System32\msvcr100.dll and C:\Windows\SysWOW64\msvcr100.dll.

instructions: Install both the x86 and x64 Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable packages

error.message: The program can't start because MSVCR120.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix this problem.
error.comment: This error shows up in a Windows graphical error message dialogue that pops up in the user environment

diagnosis.summary: In Mozilla Firefox Windows builds, this error occurs when an attempt is made to run a rustc compiler, which has a dependency on C:\Windows\System32\msvcr120.dll and C:\Windows\SysWOW64\msvcr120.dll.

instructions: Install both the x86 and x64 Microsoft Visual C++ 2013 Redistributable packages

error.message: configure: error: DirectX SDK at C:/Program Files (x86)/Microsoft DirectX SDK (June 2010) appears broken.
error.comment: This error shows up in 32 bit Firefox build logs during the old-configure step.

diagnosis.summary: In Mozilla Firefox Windows builds, this error occurs when the configure step attempts to locate the path to D3DCompiler_43_x86.cab

instructions: If the cab file exists on the filesysten (under C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft DirectX SDK (June 2010)\Redist), the problem may be with the path to "C:\mozilla-build\msys\bin\find.exe" having a lower priority than "C:\Windows\System32\find.exe". Change the resolution order in the PATH environment variable to give priority to msys find.

error.message: configure: error: This version (..) of the MSVC compiler is unsupported.
error.comment: This error shows up in 32 bit Firefox build logs during the old-configure step.

error.message: configure: error: cannot compile for x86_64-pc-windows-msvc with C:/Users/Task_1461264561/build/src/rustc/bin/rustc
error.comment: This error shows up in 64 bit Firefox build logs during the old-configure step.
